content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Fleet Lady, from Pat Novak For Hire. This episode originally aired March 6, 1949.

(32:52) The Adventures Of Michael Shayne closes this week’s show with his story from January 14, 1947, Judge Thorman Shot.

Download CaseClosed736

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
